channel.title: Cant login whit new acc
channel.description: My friend cant login whit new acc to my server.Only people who had saves can login.Some time ago login whit new acc worked (i didnt do nothing)now its not working..eney ideas how to fix this?P.S u can login whit new acc if u reload client,then its working...but i want people to login whit first time not reloading client :s..

item.title: Cant login whit new acc
item.dc:creator: @skulledace22 skulledace22
item.description:
@skulledace22 wrote:

Sorry,rushed whit text.Its z508 base.New player cant login whit first try,they need to reload client to login whit account “new player” made before reloading.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant login whit new acc
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I don’t get what you mean, you mean if the save is already there it will load accordingly, but the server cannot write new files? Can the server write player rights etc? Is it PI/delta? What client?

Please be more clear.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant login whit new acc
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“stickywicky, post:3, topic:369177”]you mean new players cannot join…that may have something to do with your ip…
or ports
only accepting old and not new[/quote]Thank you for repeating the problem and stating a completely irrelevant potential cause.

Read full topic

skulledace22:

My friend cant login whit new acc to my server.Only people who had saves can login.Some time ago login whit new acc worked (i didnt do nothing)now its not working…eney ideas how to fix this?P.S u can login whit new acc if u reload client,then its working…but i want people to login whit first time not reloading client :s…
